=== Amr Moussa ===
=== Amr Moussa ===
â
To put him to run for president [[Egypt]], but he did not deny his intention to run for office also did not rule out, leaving the field open to expectations, and argued that "the right of every citizen has the capacity and efficiency that aspires to the office would bring him to contribute to the service of the nation"<ref name="Amr Moussa opened the way for speculation before his candidacy for the presidency of Egypt">[http://arabic.cnn.com/2009/middle_east/10/20/Amro.Mousa/ Amr Moussa opened the way for speculation before his candidacy for the presidency of Egypt]</ref>.He further stated separately to the press that the qualities to be met by President of the Republic also apply to [[Gamal Mubarak]], son of President [[Egypt | Egypt]] [[Mohamed Hosni Mubarak]], and citizenship, rights and obligations apply to and can apply to you as can be applied to [[Gamal Mubarak]]<ref name="Amr Moussa did not rule out running for the presidency of Egypt">[http://ara.reuters.com/article/topNews/idARACAE59I1E020091020 Amr Moussa did not rule out running for the presidency of Egypt]</ref>. He also expressed appreciation "for the confidence expressed by many people when they talk about his candidacy for the presidency, and the confidence Iaatarbha cherished, and it has it that the letter reached him."<ref name="Amr Mousa told (Al-Shorouk): the right of every qualified citizen can aspire to serve the country and look for the presidency">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=143426 Amr Mousa told (Al-Shorouk): the right of every qualified citizen can aspire to serve the country and look for the presidency]</ref>.
+
When asked about the rumors that He might run for Egyptian presidential election in 2011, Amr Moussa he did not deny his intention to run for office or ruled it out, leaving the door open to expectations. He argued that "It's the right of every citizen that has the capacity and efficiency to aspire to any political office that would allow him to contribute to the service of his nation"<ref name="Amr Moussa opened the way for speculation about his candidacy for the presidency of Egypt">[http://arabic.cnn.com/2009/middle_east/10/20/Amro.Mousa/ Amr Moussa opened the way for speculation about his candidacy for the presidency of Egypt]</ref>. He further stated to the press that the qualities required to be the President of [[Egypt|The Republic of Egpyt]] also apply to [[Gamal Mubarak]], son of the [[Egypt]]ian President [[Hosni Mubarak]], say that citizenship, rights and obligations apply to him can be also apply to [[Gamal Mubarak]]<ref name="Amr Moussa did not rule out running for the presidency of Egypt">[http://ara.reuters.com/article/topNews/idARACAE59I1E020091020 Amr Moussa did not rule out running for the presidency of Egypt]</ref>. He also expressed appreciation "for the confidence expressed by many people when they talk about his candidacy for the presidency and that the message reached him."<ref name="Amr Mousa to (Al-Shorouk): Every qualified citizen has the right to aspire to serve the country and become the president">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=143426 Amr Mousa to (Al-Shorouk): Every qualified citizen has the right to aspire to serve the country and become the president]</ref>.
=== Sameh Ashour ===
=== Sameh Ashour ===
